heading: HR00950
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE CONTINUED SUSPENSION OF CLASSES IN ALL MODES OF LEARNING—ON-SITE, OFF-SITE, ONLINE, AND OFFLINE—IN ALL LEVELS OF PUBLIC AND PRIVATE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS UNTIL A CORONAVIRUS DISEASE 2019 (COVID-19) VACCINE HAS BEEN DEVELOPED AND MADE PUBLICLY AVAILABLE
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2020-06-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00950
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE CONTINUED SUSPENSION OF CLASSES IN ALL MODES OF LEARNING—ON-SITE, OFF-SITE, ONLINE, AND OFFLINE—IN ALL LEVELS OF PUBLIC AND PRIVATE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS UNTIL A CORONAVIRUS DISEASE 2019 (COVID-19) VACCINE HAS BEEN DEVELOPED AND MADE PUBLICLY AVAILABLE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DATOL, FRANCISCO JR. G
DATE FILED : 2020-06-03
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2020-06-04
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION
